summary: Sting, Frodo\'s sword, passed down by he\'s uncle Bilbo.
descriptionHtml:
Heya!

Update V1.1:
-Removed the glow
-made the texture a bit clearer

Update V2.0:
-Shortened the weapon a bit
-Enchanted the glow a bit (couldnt remove it because of the blades colour)
-Updated the crafting recipe\'s and made it elven

Ive been modelling for a little time now and decided id make Sting!
It includes 2 versions of Sting: 

Steel: (crafted by 5 steel bars, 2 iron bars, 2 leather scraps, 1 firewood and 1 sapphire)
Elven: (crafted by 3 quicksilver bars, 2 iron bars, 2 leather scraps, 1 firewood and 1 sapphire)

Please, make any requests below in the comment section, i will take the best/most popular ideas into reality!

Alternatively, they can be bought at the Skyforge.

Credits to Phat3 for porting it to Skyrim, your awesome!
author: Kwant
